description:
At the March 2019 Python Frederick event, Matt focused on the fundamentals of Python testing while using the pytest package.

The code for tonight's presentation is available to review on GitHub at https://github.com/python-frederick/python-testing-101.

Python Frederick is the Python user group in Frederick, MD. You can learn more about the group at https://www.pythonfrederick.org/.

Want to learn more? You can check out my most popular articles at https://www.mattlayman.com/most-popular/. 

I also have a newsletter where I share articles about #Python and other software topics. Join in at https://www.mattlayman.com/newsletter/.
title: Python Testing 101 with pytest
